text: Tada is a Hindi action drama film of Bollywood directed by Shisir P. Mishra and produced by Raju L. Shanklesha. This film was released in 29 August 2003 by Jain Movies. == Plot == Tada is a story of gangsters of Mumbai. Balraj, a common man, lives happily with his two brothers Ajay and Uday. Ajay is a police officer. The gang of Bitthal Rao kill their parents. With the intent to take revenge on the killers, Balraj gradually becomes the Don of the city who fights against corrupt police and other criminals. His younger brother Uday joins with Balraj. The three brothers are imprisoned by corrupt policeman Dandekar under the Terrorist and Disruptive Activities (Prevention) Act or TADA Act. Now the three start a mission against Bitthal's group and take the law in their own hands. == Cast == * Dharmendra as Balraj * Sadashiv Amrapurkar as Dandekar * Shakti Kapoor * Mohan Joshi as Shankar * Monica Bedi * Mukesh Khanna as Ajay * Rami Reddy as Bitthal Rao * Avtar Gill * Sharad Kapoor as Uday * Deepak Shirke * Pinky Chinoy * Deep Dhillon * Shama Deshpande * Ishrat Ali * Ram Mohan == Soundtrack == == References == == External links == * Category:Indian films Category:2003 films Category:2000s action films Category:2000s Hindi-language films Category:Indian action drama films Category:Indian films about revenge
title: Tada (film)
